lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: How did Jacob feel about his two wives, Rachel and Leah?
At the beginning, which of Jacob’s two wives could have children?
What did Leah think would happen after she had sons for Jacob?
Because she couldn’t have children, what did Rachel do?
answers: Gave her servant Bilhah to be Jacob’s wife
Wanted to marry a different man

questions.text: How many children did Rachel’s servant Bilhah have?
After Rachel gave her servant to Jacob, what did Leah do?
answers: Gave her servant Zilpah to be Jacob’s wife
Told Jacob to stop having children

questions.text: After Leah’s servant had two children, what happened to Leah?
answers: She had two more sons and a daughter
She stopped having any more children

questions.text: After waiting for years, what did God do for Rachel?
answers: Give her a son, who she named Joseph
Take her to a new land

questions.text: What happened when Rachel gave birth to her second son Benjamin?
answers: She became very sick, but got better

questions.text: How many wives did Jacob have? How many kids?
